verses.name: Ruth 1:13
verses.text: Would ye tarry for them till they were grown? would ye stay for them from having husbands? nay, my daughters; for it grieveth me much for your sakes that the hand of the Lord is gone out against me.

verses.name: Ruth 1:14
verses.text: And they lifted up their voice, and wept again: and Orpah kissed her mother in law; but Ruth clave unto her.

verses.name: Ruth 1:15
verses.text: And she said, Behold, thy sister in law is gone back unto her people, and unto her gods: return thou after thy sister in law.
